title.narrative: ECONOMIC EMPOWERMENT FOR YEMENI YOUNG MEN AND WOMEN AT RISK

description.narrative: This project therefore aims to restore and improve livelihoods, to create productive and decent emergency employment to increase income generation through sustainable enterprise development and by improving the employability of vulnerable groups. The proposed intervention, will empower youth at risk, including at least 30% of women, and will contribute to the improved security by creating sustainable and alternative livelihood opportunities for youth at risk of joining armed groups and violent extremism. The project will also ensure that communities from various factions and groups are to the extent possible involved in joint activities in order to create space for reconciliation. Last, the project will always be clear in its targeting mechanisms for beneficiaries, and will put in place a complaint mechanism so that communities have the necessary trust in its fair implementation .

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

sector.narrative: Outcome 1: More and better jobs for inclusive growth and improved youth employment prospects

transaction.ref: YEM/18/02/OCH-2018-YEM156 - Skills based gender sensitive market relevant economic empowerment programmes for youth contribute to a smooth transition phase.-2

provider-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs
